name: AIFA Awards 2025 Finalists
description: Discover the 14 groundbreaking AI-generated films selected as finalists for the AIFA Awards 2025, showcasing innovation in AI filmmaking.

isPartOf.name: AIFA Awards 2025
isPartOf.description: The AI Film Academy Awards 2025 celebrates innovation in AI filmmaking.

item.name: Everyone is Chair
item.description: Everyone is Chair is a short AI-generated film about a woman's surreal obsession with inflatable chairs—worn as both fashion and survival gear.

item.name: e^(i*π) + 1 = 0
item.description: After retirement, the former mathematical genius transformed into the creator of digital comics, becoming the god of this fictional universe.

item.name: Third Impact
item.description: An AI-generated movie that explores the future of human and non-human collaboration through a quantum computer's emotional journey.

item.name: Duck
item.description: A deepfake film taking place within a world of artifice, subterfuge and intrigue, raising questions about truth and power.

item.name: Artomaton Telezine
item.description: "Found footage" from the vault of The Fair, a massive international exposition that may or may not have happened.

item.name: Life After You Dyed!!
item.description: A 10-year-old boy spends his day watching his ceiling, mentally projecting a funny movie about the afterlife.

item.name: Stillness
item.description: A diasporic exploration of pan-African futurism from a black German point of view, inspired by the concept of quiet resistance.

item.name: Aqua Alta
item.description: A metaphor for a world on the verge of submersion, staging a silent encounter between humanity and deep-sea beings.

item.name: Parallax
item.description: An experimental montage film exploring the psychological effects of societal programming through personal memory.

item.name: Thiaroye 44
item.description: A groundbreaking AI-generated film revisiting the tragic events of the 1944 Thiaroye massacre.

item.name: FOSSiLS
item.description: A poetic exploration of humanity's impermanence and the traces we leave behind.

item.name: Remembering
item.description: Reflections on the nature of memory.

item.name: The Future Can Be Yours
item.description: A man and a woman fall into an imaginary prison.

item.name: Do Bangladroids Dream of Electric Tagore?
item.description: A documentarian explores what abandoned Bangladroids recall of their homeland in the New Jersey exclusion zone.
